### summary

```{r summary}
devtools::document()
devtools::install()

library(summarizer)
library(crosstalk)

sh_df <- SharedData$new(iris)

bscols(
  filter_select('species', 'Species', sh_df, ~Species),
  paste0("Result of Sepal.Length / Sepal.Width: "),
  summarizer(sh_df, 
                  statistic = 'sum', column = 'Sepal.Length', 
                  statistic2 = 'sum', column2 = 'Sepal.Width',
                  digits = 2)
)
```
